mapper.sql: select receipt_details_id, receipt_id, goods_id, customer_id, gross_weight, cages_number, price, tare_weight, pound_position, amount, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from ye_receipt_details
mapper.select:
select b.receipt_details_id, a.delivery_date, b.goods_id, b.customer_id, b.gross_weight, b.cages_number, b.price, b.tare_weight, b.pound_position, b.amount, b.status, b.create_by, b.create_time, b.update_by, b.update_time, c.goods_name, d.customer_name from ye_receipt a left join ye_receipt_details b on b.receipt_id = a.receipt_id left join ye_goods c on c.goods_id = b.goods_id left join ye_customer d on d.customer_id = b.customer_id
and a.status = '0' and b.status = '0' and c.status = '0' and d.status = '0'
AND a.delivery_date >= to_date(#{deliveryDateBeginTime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
AND a.delivery_date <= to_date(#{deliveryDateEndTime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
and b.customer_id = #{customerId}
